name: Manga coordinate system
description:
Please playy by full screen button to get best experience. This is a 48 hours solo game jam project and the topic is MATRIX.

In the mathematics of the right Angle coordinate system for inspiration design of small puzzle games. Each of the four quadrants can move in only two directions, which is used as the logic for decryption. The screen, which is also split into quarters, is reminiscent of a comic. It just happened that the hand drawing board was broken so I just hand painted it on paper. The arrangement of bgm is also dominated by joy, directly using simple chords of children's songs.

The arrow keys in the game will control the movement of all the characters at the same time, and need to press a certain sequence of keys to avoid obstacles and let the characters reach the goal.
